price: 64. Ku duufsona waxooda aad karto oo ka mid ah codkaaga (hees, durbaan, kaman, qalab muusikeed la afuufo, iyo xumo ugu yeedhid kasta), oo u soo kulmi ciidamma- daada iyagoo gaadiid wata iyo iyagoo lug ku socdaba, oo la wadaag maalka (adigoo ka yeelaya inay xaaraan ku shaqeystaan) iyo awlaadda (adigoo u qurxinaya zinada iyo macsida si uu u bato fasaadka), una yabooh (ballamo been ah), umase yabooho shaydaanku waxaan dhagar aheyn.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَفۡزِزۡ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتَ مِنۡهُم بِصَوۡتِكَ وَأَجۡلِبۡ عَلَيۡهِم بِخَيۡلِكَ وَرَجِلِكَ وَشَارِكۡهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَٰدِ وَعِدۡهُمۡۚ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tafziz mani is'taṭaʿta min'hum biṣawtika wa-ajlib ʿalayhim bikhaylika warajilika washārik'hum fī al-amwāli wal-awlādi waʿid'hum wamā yaʿiduhumu al-shayṭānu illā ghurūran
